name: Rippling HR
description: Integrate with Rippling HR to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Employees
tools.description: List employees from Rippling. Returns names, emails, titles, and department information.

tools.name: Get Employee
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Rippling employee by their ID.

tools.name: List Departments
tools.description: List all departments in Rippling. Returns department names, head counts, and leadership info.

tools.name: List Teams
tools.description: List all teams in Rippling. Returns team names, members count, and team leads.

tools.name: Get Company
tools.description: Get company information from Rippling. Returns company name, address, employee count, and configuration.
